title: Cop land
creator_credit: Woods Entertainment, Miramax Films, Gary Woods, Cathy Konrad, Ezra Swerdlow and James Mangold
brief_description: Freddy Heflin is a simple, small-town sheriff whose life is about to change. After he uncovers evidence of murder, faked suicide and police tampering, Freddy must choose between the man he idolizes, the woman he adores and the law he’s sworn to defend. Cast includes Sylvester Stallone, Harvey Keitel, Ray Liotta, Robert de Niro.
